definition: the sky/the firmament/the vault of heaven

sentences.english: The heavens declare the glory of God and the firmament shows His handiwork.
sentences.chinese: 諸天述說神的榮耀，穹蒼傳揚祂的手段。

sentences.english: who stretches out the heavens like a curtain and spreads them like a tent to live in.
sentences.chinese: 他鋪張穹蒼如幔子，展開諸天如可住的帳棚。

sentences.english: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
sentences.chinese: 諸天述說神的榮耀，穹蒼傳揚他的手段。

sentences.english: Look unto the heavens, and see; and behold the clouds which are higher than thou.
sentences.chinese: 你要向天觀看，瞻望那高於你的穹蒼。

sentences.english: So do we become big, even as the earth and firmaments are big.
sentences.chinese: 這樣我們便變得偉大起來，象大地和穹蒼那麼偉大。

sentences.english: He quaffed the swelling rapture of life from the foaming goblet of the infinite .
sentences.chinese: 他從那穹蒼的起泡的杯中，痛飲充滿生命的狂喜。

sentences.english: 1The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.
sentences.chinese: 諸天述說神的榮耀，穹蒼傳揚他的手段。

definition: in large numbers/in force/lit. clouds bubbling up
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
